about.title: About me
about.p1: My name is Erick Ernesto López Valdés, but in the dev world, I'm known as ErickBeLike. I got into programming out of a curiosity to understand how the video games and applications I used daily actually worked.
about.p2: While I've forged myself as a full-stack developer, my true passion lies in the backend: designing the logic, refining services, and building the efficient, scalable endpoints that make everything run smoothly.
about.p3: I'm a firm believer in finding a way to achieve my goals, no matter the obstacles. You could say I'm guilty of being an optimist, but it’s a trait that drives me to find solutions where others see dead ends. I operate on a simple philosophy: it’s better to tackle challenges with a positive mindset than to be defined by them.
about.mentality_part1: From the world of gaming, I bring a core belief to my work:
about.mentality_part2: When I commit to a goal, I pursue it with relentless dedication, constantly iterating and improving until I achieve mastery.
